attributes.action: To be Accountable to the British People
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Time after time, successive Government's, irregardless of their political party, have failed to deliver their election promises to the British People. The end result is a country whose social infrastructure is falling apart at the seams due to such ineffective Government. Therefore, I propose the introduction of a law whereby cabinet members of such a Government who fail to keep their promises to the British People, are banned for a minimum of ten years from seeking re-election to the house of commons or becoming a peer in the house of lords.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
